DOCNAME: CASE OF ŘÍMSKOKATOLICKÁ FARNOST OBŘÍSTVÍ v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant is an organisational unit of ORG with its head office in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ( according to the applicant ) or DATE ( according to ORG ) , the applicant lodged an action with ORG ( okresní soud ) against PERSON , seeking to establish its ownership of plots of land with a church and belfry in Obříství .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s request of DATE for an interim measure to secure the applicant ’s access to and use of the property in question . This decision was delivered to the applicant ’s lawyer and the defendant on CARDINAL and DATE respectively . On DATE , the defendant received a copy of the applicant ’s action .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s appeal of DATE against the decision on interim measures was delivered to the defendant , who sent his observations on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the case - file was submitted to ORG ( krajský soud ) , which on DATE quashed the lower court ’s decision and remitted the case to it for further consideration . It ordered ORG to hear the parties to the proceedings before deciding on the request .
CARDINAL . In DATE ORG decision was received by the parties to the proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG fixed a hearing for DATE , at which it granted the requested interim measure .

CARDINAL . Upon the defendant ’s appeal of DATE , received by the applicant ’s lawyer on CARDINAL DATE and after the submission of the case - file to ORG on DATE , the latter upheld ORG decision on DATE . This decision entered into force on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing , at which it dismissed the applicant ’s action .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG , upon the applicant ’s appeal of DATE , supplemented on DATE , quashed ORG judgment and remitted the case to it for further consideration .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s received the ORG decision of DATE appointing an expert in the field of church law .
CARDINAL . It appears that the proceedings are still pending .
